Circumstance penalty on auditory **Perception**.

Circumstance penalty on auditory **Perception** and **physical ranged attacks**.
Flying requires a **Maneuver in Flight** action, and fliers are blown away on a critical failure or if they don't succeed at a minimum of one such check each round.
